languages.text: "Нет ли новостей от Лорд-капитана? Все такое синее... мне это не нравится".
"Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."
languages.original_text: "Нет ли новостей от Лорд-капитана? Все такое синее... мне это не нравится".

traits.locale_text: "Have there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything looks so blue... I do not like it."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Have there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything looks so blue... I do not like it."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Avez-vous reçu une quelconque communication de la part {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Ces teintes de bleu, partout autour de nous... Je n'aime pas ça. »
languages.original_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous reçu une quelconque communication de la part {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Ces teintes de bleu, partout autour de nous... Je n'aime pas ça. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Gibt es etwas Neues vom Lord Captain? Es ist alles so blaustichig ... Das gefällt mir nicht."
languages.original_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."

traits.locale_text: "Gibt es etwas Neues vom Lord Captain? Es ist alles so blaustichig ... Das gefällt mir nicht."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Ha recibido noticias de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? Todo esto pinta muy mal... No me gusta nada».
languages.original_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha recibido noticias de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? Todo esto pinta muy mal... No me gusta nada».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “有没有收到舰长大人的消息？一切都染上了蓝色……我很不喜欢这种感觉。”
languages.original_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."

traits.locale_text: “有没有收到舰长大人的消息？一切都染上了蓝色……我很不喜欢这种感觉。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンから何か知らせはありませんか？何もかも青色で…嫌な感じがします」
languages.original_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンから何か知らせはありませんか？何もかも青色で…嫌な感じがします」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'dan haber var mı? Her şey mavi tonlarında. Bundan hoşlanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Has there been any news from the Lord Captain? Everything is shaded so blue... I do not like it."
